70010000061464.description:
90 seconds to hunt as many chickens and collect as many points as possible. Beat your personal record and compete with players around the globe. 

But wait, there's more! Score over 800 points, and you'll unlock the full version of the classic Moorhuhn Remake.

Finally, you can enjoy this Moorhuhn classic, also known as Crazy Chicken and Chicken Hunter, featuring the wildest and most famous chicken in the world on modern devices. Step into the shoes of the chicken hunter. Move the screen left and right to find more chickens. Aim and shoot quickly to take down all the flying birds. The harder they are to hit, the more points you score!

The Original Moorhuhn Hunt is a great way to kill a few minutes or spend a few hours while challenging other players worldwide. The hunting season is open!

Note: Moorhuhn Remake is a reimagining of the classic Moorhuhn Remake game. It is distinct from the separately sold Moorhuhn Remake with Multiplayer available in the Nintendo eShop.
70010000061464.intro: Celebrate 25 years of The Original Moorhuhn Hunt! Play the iconic game that started it all and unlock the classic Moorhuhn Remake as a bonus.
70010000061464.name: The Original Moorhuhn Hunt

70010000071604.description:
During your journey through the gates, you will face various dangers and all you can depend on are your reflexes, the ability to move around the battlefield, the plan your actions, and good timing of casting combo spells. Enemies that you will face will require you to adjust your strategy and equipment. In Gatewalkers, with the change of your equipment comes a change of your fight style - all the skills are attributed to particular elements of your armor and weapons. You are what you wear!

The survival part of the game will expose RPG lovers to new challenges, which are rare in this genre. Looking for resources needed to craft new weapons, maintaining good mental health in the terrifying forest, managing your body temperature at the ice world, or caring for nutrition and hydration of the character are only some of the offered mechanics.

You can play Gatewalkers solo, or in cooperation with up to 4 players.

Gatewalkers features:

TEAM CO-OP

As a Gatewalker, one of the chosen few, you can go through the Gate and explore the worlds that lay on the other side. Team up with up to 3 other players in this team-based survival. Fight terrifying monsters, survive extreme weather conditions, follow the orders given by the Guild, and most importantly, stay alive!

WORLD EXPLORATION

Explore the procedurally generated worlds with unique terrain features, plants, and creatures. Discover new resources and crafting materials. Face various environmental hazards: toxic or unbreathable atmosphere, terrifying darkness, penetrating cold, and much more. Each world type introduces a unique survival mechanic that forces you to adapt. Finding food, water or wood to start a fire may be impossible. Consider carefully what to bring with you on the expedition, as no one really knows what awaits on the other side of the Gate.

TEAM SURVIVAL

Surviving alone in an unknown world is really hard. But with teammates at your side, you at least stand a chance. Share the responsibilities: start a fire to let others warm up, build a tent to let your mates rest, warn them about the dangers lurking in the night. The key to surviving is cooperation between you and your team.

SKILL BASED COMBAT

Isometric skill-based combat without auto targeting. Your skills may miss, and you can dodge enemy attacks! Good positioning during combat, balanced use of skills, proper timing and team synergy are all crucial to victory.

CRAFTING

Choose an item to craft. Discover the appropriate recipe. Raid different worlds to gather required resources. Find or create a crafting station. Finally, build the item and use it!

YOU ARE WHAT YOU WEAR

There are no predefined character classes. Each item gives you a unique set of skills, so try tinkering with different builds. Take heavy armor and a healing staff to support your mates in the front line by tanking and restoring health. Remember, you are, what you wear!

PROCEDURALLY GENERATED WORLDS

Each time you pass the Gate you will land in a different, procedurally generated world. This gives you countless opportunities, offers constant challenges, and forces you to adapt in order to win in changing conditions! Always stay cautious, modify your strategy, make fast decisions and face their consequences, because you never know what waits around the corner.
70010000071604.intro: Gatewalkers is a unique mixture of co-op game, survival and RPG. You, as a Gatewalkers, travel across different worlds in order to save your own.
70010000071604.name: Gatewalkers

70010000086429.description:
"Meet Magrat the witch, Harvey the weird fish, Stephanie the green cow and all their beloved friends, and embark on an epic journey through 100 arcade games that blend classic gameplay from your favorite retro titles with new concepts that are reinventing the arcade genre! Score as much as you can, then improve and challenge yourself to get all stars in solo or with your friends! 

Key Features 
•	100 different games for a long and diverse journey : Experience a perfect mix of beloved classic gameplay and fresh, innovative challenges that will keep you hooked for a while! 
•	Follow the snake: Follow Tutorial Snake and his friends and improve your scores to unlock new minigames as long as you’re playing! 
•	Always better with friends: Train yourself alone and fight for the best score in multiplayer mode against your friends and family! 
•	Experience them all: From puzzle-solving and strategy games to fast-paced action and arcade classics, there's something for everyone in 100 in 1 Game Collection.
•	A game compilation like never before: 100 in 1 Game Collection includes all your favorites minigames from the acclaimed “30 in 1 Game Collection Volume 1 & 2” and adds 40 new games to the bill! "
70010000086429.intro: 100 in 1 Game Collection is a gigantic compilation of 100 arcade games that blend classic arcade games with fresh concepts.
70010000086429.name: 100 in 1 Game Collection

70010000089647.description:
The enemy mothership has been destroyed and is about to explode. Reinforcements are coming, but your battered ship's guns are overheated and almost useless. Thankfully, you also have bombs. Lots of bombs. Blast Rush LS is a fast-paced bullet hell shooter with an endless supply of screen-clearing weapons.

It's just you, your ship, and seemingly endless amounts of drones in ever more complex waves. But hey, you got all those bombs to use! Blast your way out and rush to victory!

* A refreshing feature-packed take on shoot-em-ups that dares to ask: "What if bomb, but way too much?"
* Three distinct fighters with nine different screen-clearing bombs to try (and blow through enemies on an industrial scale) and extra techniques like destructive sideswipes or the slow-mo power of Hyperdodge!
* Take on over 40 intense levels with almost impossible amounts of drones in twisting, complex waves coming after your ship. 
* Prefer an even greater challenge? Have a go at the randomized Endurance or 2-minute styles.
* More blasting fun awaits in the “Blast Box,” a host of four challenges where you’ll beat the clock, fight enemies in the dark, wriggle through a dangerous maze, or launch a ship like it’s a sporting event.
* 16-bit-style graphics with a pulse-pounding chiptune soundtrack
* Explore the Library to check out game development notes, concept pixel art, a music player when you’re away from the action, and more!
* The full original version of Blast Rush is included as part of the package!
70010000089647.intro:
Blast your way through relentless waves in Blast Rush LS! 
Unlimited bombs, intense challenges, and explosive 
action await in this fresh take on bullet hell shooters.
70010000089647.name: Blast Rush LS

70010000090363.description:
Enter a colourful world that's looking for a new football star! Defeat your opponents with your amazing skills and take the cup home! 

Get through the tutorial, master the game controls and choose your team to start your football career. Defeat all your opponents while collecting achievements and have fun with the different game modes.

Become the biggest football star!
70010000090363.intro: Take the title of the best football player in a cute cartoon world.
70010000090363.name: Football Mini Stars

70010000090984.description:
Civilization has ended, and something else awakens in its place. From the world’s decay, ancient creatures stir, rise, and roam the land.

Vessels of Decay is a post-apocalyptic action-adventure following the story of Freja and Mud. In this retro-inspired tale, you’ll confront creatures of Scandinavian myth and folklore, and explore the ruins of the civilization they inhabit.

- Dynamic Battle System: How you execute combat – and how your enemies perish – is entirely up to you!

- Unique Finishers: Every new enemy is a new opportunity for you to show your flair for combat; stagger your foes to set them up for (literally) killer animations and flourishes.

- Epic Multi-Stage Boss Encounters: The beasts of Scandinavian folklore will not let themselves be put down so easily, and you’ll have to use your wits and reflexes to pursue and slay them!

- Explore A Beautiful World of Pixels, Death, and Decay: Vessels of Decay is a completely handcrafted world, with care and thought poured into each and every scene, story beat, and environment.

- A Scandinavian Take on Classic Action-Adventure: The battered ruins of a once-modern society clash with the renewed growth of nature – and of the supernatural. Explore a uniquely Scandinavian setting through a mix of reflective melancholy, exploration, and fast-paced action.
70010000090984.intro: An overgrown world where monsters of myth and ancient folklore now reign.
70010000090984.name: Vessels of Decay

70010000092097.description:
You are Sandman, the spirit said to bring good dreams. To bring the children back to their families, Sandman must descend into the realm of Morpheus — a dream god who twists sleep into prison. Here, every fear ever buried comes alive.

They’re waiting. But the dream already knows you’re here. And it will stop at nothing to ensure you never leave.

Through the Nightmares is a game for people who love platforming challenges and secrets. Each of your (many) deaths will be a lesson, and instant respawns make you always ready to try again.

The core gameplay of Through the Nightmares is designed around three Sandman abilities:
• Size-Shifting — Change your size to squeeze through tight spaces, physically manipulate traps, and go through shortcuts. Changing your size also affects your weight and speed. Mastering this ability is the key to surviving a dreamscape designed to destroy you.
• Downward Strike — Smash through walls and floors with a mid-air blow, uncovering new paths and activating mechanisms. Every change to the level persists, even after death.
• Checkpoint Flask — Find, pick up, and place this magical item anywhere in the level to create a checkpoint. Flask lets you resurrect three times before being sent back to the start. Death comes quickly, frustration doesn’t have to.

You must combine all Sandman abilities to confront Morpheus and escape the nightmare. And if you find the game too easy, there are dozens of secrets waiting to be uncovered by the most daring players!
70010000092097.intro: A hardcore platformer for anyone who’s ever been jolted awake from a fright.
70010000092097.name: Through the Nightmares

70010000092958.description:
Design, build, and automate a railway empire! Start with a few tracks and stations and grow your network into a thriving automated system of trains crisscrossing real-world-inspired city maps. Watch your creation evolve from simple manual connections into a fully automated masterpiece!

Master the Art of Automation
Experience the thrill of dispatching and transforming your small, manual network into an automated, self-sufficient marvel. 

-Plan and build with precision to keep trains running on time.
-Strategize upgrades to expand and improve operations.
-Automate and expand to watch your creation thrive.

Rail Around the Globe
Build rail networks across multiple maps inspired by real-world locations - Amsterdam, Berlin, Chicago, Glasgow, London, Osaka, Paris, Prague, Shanghai, Tokyo, New York, and more!

Play Your Way
Whether you’re a casual player or a master strategist, Rail Route offers something for everyone:
-Story Mode: Learn the game under the guidance of a fatherly veteran conductor who takes you under his wing and leads you on a journey of memories and timeless life lessons.
-Endless Mode: Build your network from scratch at your own pace in a relaxed and chill play session.
-Timetable Mode: Solve puzzle-like challenges on pre-set maps and schedules, designed for players who enjoy a strategic test.
-Rush Hour Mode: Face waves of intense dispatching challenges, ideal for those who thrive on overcoming complex obstacles.

Easy to Start, Rewarding to Master
With its intuitive design, Rail Route is accessible to new players while offering deep gameplay for automation enthusiasts. Every signal you place, every contract you take adds a new layer of complexity, reflecting the challenges of real-world rail management.
70010000092958.intro: Build, manage and automate your rail network.
70010000092958.name: Rail Route

70010000093195.intro: Build your dream farm in this unique blend of farming and puzzle adventure! Grow crops, raise adorable animals, and solve delightful puzzles to unlock new items and expand your farm.
70010000093195.name: Hope's Farm 2

70010000093304.description:
Tanks, But No Tanks is an updated take on a classic top-down arena tank shooter. This multiplayer madhouse will keep you on your toes as you balance collecting coins on each map with shooting projectiles at your foes. Upgrade your tank’s weapons, armor, and special abilities in between rounds with the coins you accrue.

Aim your bullets and shoot your way through each level. Just be sure that you don't ricochet a bullet right back toward yourself!

Use a diverse weapon set, ranging from deployable turrets to teleportation projectiles to cause extra mayhem on the battlefield!

Features
• 15+ Unique Levels
• 15+ Weapon & Character Upgrades
• Tournament Style Play Rewards The Player Who Survives The Most Rounds
• Play With Up To 4 Local Players
• Different Game Modes Including Free-For-All & Teams
• Adjustable Bot Difficulty
70010000093304.intro:
Battle friends in a chaotic arena shooter with ricocheting bullets.
Collect coins, buy upgrades, and unleash wild weapons.
70010000093304.name: Tanks, But No Tanks

70010000094002.description:
Experience intense, tactical FPS action like never before in SHADOWFRAME — a unique black-and-white shooter where every movement rewrites time itself.

Whether you're dodging bullets in slow motion or plotting the perfect takedown, SHADOWFRAME turns every step into a strategic decision.

Features:
• Freeze Time, Master Combat: Time stands still until you move. Think fast, move smart, and outmaneuver enemies in a world where every second counts.
• Campaign Mode: Fight against the clock through 15 stylish, handcrafted levels.
• Endless Survival: Face never-ending waves of enemies. How long can you survive?
• Striking Visual Style: Play in a bold black-and-white world where shadows reveal danger and movement brings it to life.

SHADOWFRAME brings stylish, slow-motion combat - perfect for players who love a twist on classic FPS gameplay.

Move with purpose. Shoot with precision. Survive in the shadows.
70010000094002.intro: Freeze time. Analyze the battlefield. Then make your move. In SHADOWFRAME, reflexes alone won’t save you — you’ll need precision, patience, and planning to survive.
70010000094002.name: SHADOWFRAME

70010000094687.description:
The fictional railway “Kowa Railway,” boasting over 500,000 views on YouTube, now comes to life as a game!
Explore a sprawling route of 11 stations in total freedom.
In the “Free Drive Mode,” there’s no scoring and no automatic stops—stop or pass stations, open and close doors, and play in-train announcements exactly as you wish.
For an adrenaline rush, switch to the “Overdrive Mode” and experience speeds exceeding 1000km/h!
Open or close doors wherever you like, use a free camera to view your train from any angle, and even run side by side with AI-controlled trains.
Sound the horn, play station arrival announcements, and enjoy carefully crafted departure melodies to immerse yourself in a truly authentic atmosphere.
Feel free to blow the whistle when closing the doors or add any detail you like.
Plus, it supports the “ZUIKI” train controller for an even more realistic operation.
Get ready for a brand-new train driving experience!

This work is in no way affiliated with any real-world railway company.
70010000094687.intro:
The ultimate railway driving game has arrived!
Experience mind-blowing speeds over 1000km/h or enjoy complete freedom in Free Drive!
70010000094687.name: Train Plus

70010000095120.description:
A fixed-screen action game that allows you to play with up to two players using flower fairies Tamabo and Hanabo. Your goal: to fill the entire stage with blooming flowers.

Story:
Every nook and cranny in Bloom Paradise was once filled with flowers of every color, until one day when pesky pests came and ravaged the land, rendering it unrecognizable. Thus, flower fairies Tamabo and Hanabo have joined forces, setting off on an adventure to restore Bloom Paradise to its former glory and get rid of those irksome pests.

How to Play:
Play as either Tamabo (Player 1) or Hanabo (Player 2) and make flowers bloom. Fill all the grounds in each stage to clear it.

How you bloom flowers differs between single-player mode and two-player mode. In single-player mode, flowers bloom on the ground as Tamabo walks across. In two-player mode, however, when either Tamabo or Hanabo walks across the ground, only flower buds appear. The other character must then touch these buds to make them bloom. Work together to take back Bloom Paradise from the pests.

Both Tamabo and Hanabo can shoot water in the direction they're facing with the use of the attack button. Flowers can't bloom when the ground is covered in mud, so use water to clean up and eradicate any pests standing in your way.
70010000095120.intro: A fixed-screen action game offering a 2-player coop mode.
70010000095120.name: Bloom Paradise

70010000096025.description:
Each run takes just 20–30 minutes — perfect for relaxing anytime! Whether you're unwinding after a long day or just killing time, it's a great way to de-stress.

Choose from 10 unique classes and 7 different weapons, then mix and match to create your own personalized combat style. Hidden classes and secret talents await discovery too!

Every playstyle offers a complete build path, with multiple branches and directions to explore.

Each stage comes with fully adjustable difficulty settings, so you'll always find the perfect level of challenge.
70010000096025.intro: Blast through monster hordes with crazy weapons in a wild bullet hell! It’s chaotic, casual, and seriously fun!
70010000096025.name: Bag Hero

70010000096917.description:
This game is a drone simulation game that allows you to experience real drone flight based on footage shot by a real flying drone. 
There is no up, down, left or right direction control, only the control to increase or decrease the drone speed. 
You can also change the drone's flight mode from Normal, Sport, and Eco to any of the 3. 

Enjoy the beautiful scenery of Yadal Dock, Korea with "Real" footage! 
There are a total of 2 flight courses in 2 areas.
 high-definition footage faithfully reproduces the atmosphere of real nature, providing a strong sense of immersion in the game. 
Smooth and realistic video playback makes you feel like you are a real drone pilot. 
Large capacity! You can fly to locations that show the beautiful scenery of Korea! 
Two play modes are supported: course-specific flying mode and view mode automatic flight. There is also an achievement system. 
Visit Korea from home at any time! 
Enjoy the drone flight control experience and the beautiful natural scenery. MasCon for Nintendo Switch™ made by Zuiki of Japan is also supported.
70010000096917.name: Korean Drone Flying Tour Yadal Dock

70010000097124.description:
"STRATEGY X" is a tank-based shooting game released by KONAMI in 1981.
Move the direction of artillery fire left and right to defeat enemies and replenish fuel while progressing through the stages. 
Aim to destroy the "IMMORTALIAN" waiting at the deepest part.

The "Arcade Archives" series has faithfully reproduced many classic Arcade masterpieces.
Players can change various game settings such as game difficulty, and also reproduce the atmosphere of arcade display settings at that time. Players can also compete against each other from all over the world with their high scores.
Please enjoy the masterpiece that built a generation for video games.

The options menu and manual are available in Japanese, English, French, German, Italian, and Spanish.
70010000097124.intro: Will you go for the aggressive approach or the cautious approach?
70010000097124.name: Arcade Archives STRATEGY X

70010000097229.description:
Embark on an exhilarating journey to build your real estate empire in "Real Estate Simulator," a deep and dynamic business simulation game. Begin as a small-time property investor and strategize your way to become a tycoon in the cutthroat world of real estate. Navigate market trends, negotiate deals, and outsmart competitors in this immersive simulation experience.
- From Broke to Rich: Embark on a journey from Broke to Rich, developing skills and overcoming challenges with unwavering determination.
Start with a tent as your first home.
- Interactive NPC Negotiations: Engage with a range of NPC clients, from cautious first-time buyers to wealthy investors. Understand their needs, negotiate terms, and close deals that shape your path to success.
- Property Development and Management: Purchase, renovate, and sell properties across the city. From cheap living areas to luxury skyscrapers, each property brings unique challenges and opportunities.
- Intuitive Controls and UI: Whether you're a seasoned tycoon or new to business sims, intuitive controls and a clear user interface make managing your empire accessible and enjoyable.
- Unique Challenges and Achievements: From market crashes to VIP clients, face unique challenges that test your strategic prowess. 
Unlock achievements and make your mark in the world of real estate.
70010000097229.intro: Buy, renovate, sell — rule the real estate market.
70010000097229.name: REAL ESTATE Simulator - FROM BUM TO MILLIONAIRE

70010000097599.description:
Released in Japan by SEIN SOFT in 1986, this side-scrolling action RPG casts players as the hero Triton in an adventure to defeat monsters and restore peace to Luwanda Island, controlled by "Pay-Valusa."

Tritorn primarily fights using jumps and sword strikes. By anticipating the enemy's movements, he will swing his sword, and executing a sword strike from a jump inflicts double damage, showcasing an advanced technique. Furthermore, as Tritorn grows, he learns magic, allowing him to halt enemy movements or instantly eliminate them. 

While the game is an action RPG, it's not just about defeating enemies. There are puzzle-solving elements incorporated, where defeating specific enemies in consecutively rewards players with items. Some puzzles may be challenging, but they add depth to the gameplay.

Featuring fast-paced action, skill-based combat, engaging puzzles, and three learnable magic spells as Tritorn grows, this game offers a rich experience for action RPG enthusiasts and is also recommended for newcomers.

The MSX (ROM cartridge) version features added powerful bosses and increased final boss attack patterns. Clearing later stages will likely require different procedures than other platforms.


*This application does not have a scene select mode.
*The main game and gallery screen (*Gallery) are in Japanese version.
*Other menu screens and "How to play" screens are in English.
70010000097599.intro: In this masterpiece action RPG, the brave warrior Triton rises to restore peace to Luwanda Island. The MSX version features different strategies!
70010000097599.name: EGGCONSOLE TRITORN MSX

70010000097725.description:
Aye, captain! The seven seas still hide secrets — and no one’s better suited to uncover them than you! In Pirate Trails 2: Tentacles & Treasures, the most beloved pirate puzzle on the high seas is back with new maps, new dangers... and a lot more tentacles!

Embark on a tropical journey where your ship must follow perfect routes through a sea of hexagons. But beware! The Kraken is watching, and its tentacles block the way to the most valuable treasures. Only gunpowder can stop your ship from becoming sushi!

Collect powder kegs, trace clever paths, gather golden treasures, and lead your ship to the final port — without becoming calamari.

Explore 30 handcrafted levels across three unique biomes:

Tortuga – Where it all begins (and where the tentacles are still shy).
Port Royal – Routes multiply, and the tentacles grow fiercer.
Nassau – The ultimate challenge, where every powder keg counts and a single wrong turn could spell victory... or shipwreck.

You don’t control the ship — you control its fate. Rotate, swap, and place puzzle tiles wisely. When the route is ready, press the button and watch the ship sail through your brilliant strategy.
70010000097725.intro: Arrr you ready for more puzzlin', plunderin' and perilous tentacles?
70010000097725.name: Pirate Trails: Tentacles and Treasures

70010000097781.description:
Our heroes' next adventure is in...dinosaur times?! This time the bad guys are trying to destroy the future! The only way to fight back is with dino-transformations!

This installment includes:
- 5-minute recap of the story so far
- Special feature episodes 1-4

◆Visual Novel (Story)◆
In an effort to save a mysterious dinosaur that appears before them, Treffy and her friends travel back in time to the age of dinosaurs! There they encounter a madman bent on destroying the very future they came from!

Set following the events of Season 1, this title acts as a theatrical release for an anime might.

◆Boss Battles◆
2D action designed to be playable by all.

-Gain invincibility by dancing!

◆Series Overview◆
A visual novel series designed to remind players of the joys of Saturday morning cartoons.
Packed with transformations, cards, dancing, and robots, too! The adventure goes on—forever and always!

-Story features opening, ending, and commercial interlude animations!
This installment also features an all-in-one theatrical release mode.

-The clock on the top left can be changed to 8:00, 9:00, or whatever time you wish!

-Features all original music tracks!

-Pixel art visuals serve to offer real 2000s nostalgia.
70010000097781.intro:
The second installment in the 2000s era styled anime-themed Kokoro Clover series!
A visual novel paired with boss battles!
70010000097781.name: Kokoro Clover SUN - Prehistoric Invaders!

70010000097908.description:
Rally Drive Championship: Car Racing Game
Get ready for the ultimate off-road racing challenge! In Rally Drive Championship, you'll tear through dirt tracks, icy roads, and desert trails in high-speed time-attack races. Master tight turns, drift through rugged terrain, and beat the clock to unlock powerful rally cars and new environments. With precision driving, intense weather conditions, and adrenaline-pumping checkpoints, this is rally racing at its finest.

No brakes. No mercy. Just pure rally action.
70010000097908.intro:
Push the Limits.
Chase the Clock.
Own the Road.
70010000097908.name: Rally Drive Championship Car Racing Game

70010000098907.description:
Step into a combat-free Metroidvania world where your adventure revolves around exploration, puzzle-solving, and treasure hunt. 

Feature
- Easy to learn, hard to master
- Story with mystery 
- No combat 

Time to 100%: 4 hours 

We provide: 
- Solving the platform puzzle with player creativity, more than 1 solution in most places
- Unlock abilities in different sequence can provide difference gameplay and experience 
- accumulated knowledge allows more efficient speedrunnings  
- Bonus content to reward player who clear the game within a period of game
70010000098907.name: Hirai Nya

70010000099577.description:
Saddle up and get ready for a paw-some adventure in Cats Visiting Wild West! Explore charming hand-drawn scenes filled with saloons, dusty towns, steam trains, and desert canyons — all packed with mischievous hidden cats waiting to be found.

Search every corner of these nostalgic Wild West illustrations and test your observation skills. From sneaky cats hiding in barrels to ones peeking out of cowboy hats, can you find them all?

Each scene also hides a special collectible object — gather them all to complete your Wild West collection!

Features:
     5 beautifully illustrated Wild West scenes
     80 hidden cats to find in each level
     A collectible item hidden in every scene
     Relaxing gameplay perfect for casual players
     Timer and leaderboard for competitive cat hunters

Grab your hat, partner — those kitties won’t find themselves!
70010000099577.intro: Explore charming Wild West scenes and find hidden cats hiding in saloons, canyons, and steam trains. Relax, search, and collect them all!
70010000099577.name: Cats Visiting Wild West

70010000099907.description:
Unearth the wonders of New England in a game that combines history, adventure, and hidden object challenges. 
'Finding America: New England' takes you on an unforgettable journey. 
Seek out hidden objects amidst stunning scenery and unlock the stories of America's colonial past.

Along your journey, you'll encounter fascinating trivia about the iconic locations, play fun mini-games, and see the beauty of the New England.

- Behold the sights of New England, all done in a Hidden Object style.
- Play over 30 fun minigames, all connected to the Great Lakes area!
- Pick up fun facts about the region!
- Collector's Edition contains 12 more chapters and 6 exclusive Hidden Object scenes!
70010000099907.intro: Explore scenic landscapes and rich history of this iconic region.
70010000099907.name: Finding America: New England Collector's Edition

70050000057488.description:
TrainPlus — Rolling Stock Add‑On Vol. 1
“KOWA Railway Normal Livery”

Take the iconic orange‑and‑navy KOWA Railway train for a thrilling ride!
Push past 1,000 km/h in Free Drive and feel true high‑speed rail.

Note: This is add‑on content. The base game TrainPlus (sold separately) is required.
70050000057488.name: KOWA Train | Train Plus Rolling Stock Add-On Pack

70050000057497.description:
TrainPlus — Rolling‑Stock Add‑On Vol. 4
“KOWA Railway Sanbansen Plus Wrap”

The hit Nintendo Switch™ game Sanbansen Plus meets KOWA Railway!
This special unit wears the deep‑green livery of the Kaite Line and is covered with dozens of bold Sanbansen Plus logos.
Loop the city in style and blast past 1,000 km/h with this exclusive wrap.

Note: This is add‑on content. The base game TrainPlus (sold separately) is required.
70050000057497.name: Sanbansen Plus: Wrapping Train | Train Plus Rolling Stock Add-On Pack

70050000057498.description:
TrainPlus — Rolling‑Stock Add‑On Vol. 5
“KOWA Railway Platform 4 Wrap”

The hit Nintendo Switch™ game Platform 4 rolls onto KOWA Railway!
Sporting the blue‑and‑orange livery of the Towa Train—plus a cascade of bold Platform 4 logos—this special unit is ready for take‑off toward Naruta Airport.
Push past 1,000 km/h and showcase that unmistakable wrap across the network.

Note: This is add‑on content. The base game TrainPlus (sold separately) is required.
70050000057498.name: Platform 4: Wrapping Train | Train Plus Rolling Stock Add-On Pack

70050000057499.description:
TrainPlus — Rolling‑Stock Add‑On Vol. 2
“KOWA Railway Maridia Wrap”

The classic KOWA Railway train gets a striking makeover!
A sky‑blue nose meets orange‑and‑navy sides wrapped with vibrant artwork by three creators—including YouTuber SHINISE.
Ride with charming rail‑themed heroines and reach speeds over 1,000 km/h.

Note: This is add‑on content. The base game TrainPlus (sold separately) is required.
70050000057499.name: Maridia: Wrapping Train | Train Plus Rolling Stock Add-On Pack

70050000057502.description:
TrainPlus — Rolling‑Stock Add‑On Vol. 3
“KOWA Railway Jujin chan Wrap”

A rare emerald‑green KOWA Railway train rolls in!
Its sides feature playful illustrations of shy‑face and smug‑face Jujin chan, created by YouTuber SHINISE.
Hit the rails in style and break the 1,000 km/h barrier!

Note: This is add‑on content. The base game TrainPlus (sold separately) is required.
70050000057502.name: Jujin chan: Wrapping Train | Train Plus Rolling Stock Add-On Pack

70050000058630.description:
Meet 「Luminous & Darkness」: The DLC which consists of winning songs from the composition contest 'SIXTAR PLANET'!
This DLC contains 8 new songs and a new original theme.

< New Songs >
1. Lustroustravel - 大豆使徒(打打だいず+seatrus)
2. Síoraí - KθZyo
3. Mango Bingsu - Palami
4. 銀世界にひとり- 後藤 feat. nayuta
5. Alone in Starlight - Palami
6. În amour - ZxNX
7. Star rider - Essbee
8. StellaR-MemoriA - Raphiiel

< Theme >
"Luminous star, shine in the Darkness."
This is the special exclusive theme for Luminous & Darkness Pack that features new artwork and animations.
70050000058630.name: Sixtar Gate: STARTRAIL - Luminous & Darkness Pack

70070000028058.description:
Get every rolling‑stock pack released so far—Vols. 1 through 5—in one money‑saving bundle!

Includes

KOWA Train

Maridia: Wrapping Train

Jujin chan: Wrapping Train

Sanbansen Plus: Wrapping Train

Platform 4: Wrapping Train

From the classic orange‑and‑navy livery to bold collaborations with hit games, enjoy them all while blasting past 1,000 km/h!

Note: This is add‑on content. The base game TrainPlus (sold separately) is required.
70070000028058.name: Train Plus Rolling Stock Add‑On Pack: Complete Bundle

70070000028234.description:
Your adventure begins with Food Truck Tycoon. Cook, chop, bake and enjoy hundreds of unique dishes.

But the journey of a thousand dishes is just the beginning!

As you hone your cooking skills and build your reputation with food trucks, you'll be given the opportunity to explore more gourmet games as DLC.

Customize your kitchen with countless upgrades and serve delicious food in different locations. Keep the grill hot, keep your customers smiling, sauté, mix and serve to the top.

Face cooking challenges to become the ultimate chef in town!

So put on your apron, sharpen your knives and enter the cooking arena. Life is a party - let's cook delicious!

This bundle contains "Cooking Arena", "Sweet Bakery Tycoon" and "Pancake Bar Tycoon".
70070000028234.intro: Universe bursting with flavors and culinary adventures awaits!
70070000028234.name: Cooking Arena Sweet Time Edition

70070000028479.description:
You can purchase the main game KUUKIYOMI 4: Consider It and the additional content KUUKIYOMI 4: Consider It DLC "Dire Situations" as a value bundle.

■Included in the Set
・KUUKIYOMI 4: Consider It
・KUUKIYOMI 4: Consider It DLC "Dire Situations"

＜Main game＞
Why do humans “read the air“?
The answer lies in this “KUUKIYOMI 4: Consider It”.

This game puts the spotlight on the childhood of the main character “You”,
Let's Consider It with innocence while looking back on various events that everyone must have experienced in their childhood.

The basic rule of deciding what to do in situations by moving the red object on the screen is the same.

Please consider the situation and read the atmosphere according to the various scenes that will be asked.

＜Additional content＞
This is extra content for KUUKIYOMI 4: Let’s Play Together, and it’s all about one thing: high-stakes situations.

From small everyday mess-ups to zombie outbreaks and even alien encounters—this world is full of chaos.
Take control of the red object on screen and face 30 brand-new, slightly more dangerous scenarios than usual.
70070000028479.name: KUUKIYOMI 4: Consider It + "Dire Situations" DLC Bundle

70070000028750.description:
Step behind the counter and take on the challenge of serving up delicious meals and perfectly brewed coffee in this fast-paced, classic cooking game. Work your way through 10 unique cafes, each with its own style and demands, as you master recipes, upgrade your equipement, and keep your customers happy. 

Outside the kitchen, bring new life to Grandma’s old house by decorating it with fun furniture and personal touches. Along the way, you’ll uncover a heartfelt story of friendships, family, and finding your place in a city full of contrasts. Whether you’re here for the cooking or the story, Pixel Cafe delivers an adventure full of charm and challenges.

This bundle includes base game and Kitchen Touches (DLC #3) with:

A different variant for the Refrigerator
An updated Oven and Stove design
A new look for the Sink
An alternative style for the Bar
And, freshen up with two more wallpapers perfect for any space.
70070000028750.intro: From kitchen chaos to cozy moments
70070000028750.name: Pixel Cafe Premium Edition

70070000028934.description:
Urban Flow is a game about the subtle beauty of city streets filled with cars moving in perfect harmony. But such order does not happen all by itself - the city needs YOU to control the traffic lights and to make sure everything goes smoothly. That means no crashes, no jams. Everything will run perfectly - as long as you stay focused!

Immerse yourself in a beautiful, hand-crafted, low-poly world to discover the enormous satisfaction of watching the hundreds of tiny, colorful cars flowing through the streets – all while listening to the chill, urban music.

Over 100 levels, each with its own busy intersection. You have one job: operate the lights and keep it safe.

Party Game (even if you party all alone!)
-----
Play by yourself or with friends in scalable drop-in, drop-out local co-op mode for two, three, or four players!
You can help your friends or be a little rascal and spread the chaos!

Avoid accidents by paying close attention to special vehicles and to the other players. Special vehicles include the ambulance, which can’t wait for long, and the tank – which will plow through anything in its way.

Don’t want to play the campaign?
-----
Try our score-based Endless Mode or the Chill Mode - where you play for as long as you want, no rush and no score - only you and the music. Urban Flow is designed to be a great single player experience!

Discover various environments and weather conditions. Play with touch controls, Pro Controllers or Joy-Con™. Complete challenges and unlock rewards.

This bundle includes base game, Winter Expansion Pack, London Rules, Streets Supplement and Streets Supplement#2 with:

•    30 new stages!
•    Winter theme and new music!
•    12 new vehicles - the firetruck and snow plow!
70070000028934.intro: Manage the city lights and try to avoid the chaos!
70070000028934.name: Urban Flow Max Edition

70010000097503.description:
Everyone’s favorite ham-loving caveman named Dude has been abducted by evil space aliens. 

In this new adventure, our heroine must go on a quest through a colorful prehistoric world to save her beloved. 

Run and jump, level up, obtain helpful items, and even ride dinosaurs while overcoming challenging enemies and dangerous traps. 

Explore 4 colorful stone-age environmentson Gal’s journey to free her ham-eating boyfriend.


Features:
* Platform action gameplay
* Colorful pixel art
* Gain levels and obtain items
* Ride dinosaurs 
* 4 worlds with branching paths
70010000097503.intro: Experience an adventure in stone-age world full of prehistoric elements!
70010000097503.name: Prehistoric Gal

70010000098084.description:
Immerse yourself in a thrilling retro first-person shooter experience that captures the essence of classic console games. Step into a high-octane world filled with espionage, danger, and action as you take on the role of agent . Embark on a series of daring missions that will test your wits, reflexes, and combat skills. Navigate through captivating environments, engage in intense shootouts, and confront enemies armed with cutting-edge AI. The fate of the world rests in your hands as you uncover a global conspiracy and battle through pulse-pounding action sequences.
	•Retro FPS Action: Experience the thrill of first-person shooting, with fast-paced combat, intense firefights, and adrenaline-pumping missions.
	•Engaging Espionage Story: Uncover a global conspiracy as agent, blending stealth, strategy, and action to save the world from an impending threat.
	•Varied Missions & Objectives: Each mission offers unique challenges—hack terminals, steal secrets, rescue hostages, and eliminate enemies in diverse environments.
	•Advanced Enemy AI: Face off against AI that adapts to your every move, making each encounter unpredictable and intense.
	•Iconic Gadgets & Weapons: Use a wide range of spy gadgets and powerful weapons to overcome obstacles and take down enemies in style.

Each story mission is a self-contained environment where you must accomplish varied objectives, such as hacking terminals, stealing secret plans, rescuing civilian hostages, and much more. All the while, you’ll fight armed guards in epic shootouts.

Be the most elite agent the world has ever seen!
70010000098084.intro: Enter the mission and become a legend of espionage.
70010000098084.name: AGENT 07- SPY REVENGE

70070000022206.description:
Enemy troops, such as infantry, helicopters, tanks, warplanes, and drones, are coming for you! Jump on the machine gun and shoot them all!

Features:
- Unlock Air Marker secondary weapon with high damage per second!
- Get 60 gold bars to spend on unique weapons or boosters
- Use additional 10000 cash on weapon and troops upgrades
- Defend the country against enemy soldiers
- Fight along your military crew and defeat the opponent's army on multiple warzones
- Upgrade your loadout to win the war
- Use modern war weapons: machine guns, rocket launchers and drones
- Fight and kill bosses!
- Easy controls and realistic graphics for intense action

You're not doing war alone. Your squad is here to help you: 
- Explosive Expert with an RPG rocket launcher to deal tremendous damage to military vehicles
- Rifleman who will shoot at a high range on the open battlefield
- Grenadier who specializes in fighting all ground units. 
You are in charge of the machine gun to clear the battlefield, which is highly addictive and enjoyable!

Missions will take place in different warzones, and you will need to adapt your shooting strategy depending on the battlefield: city, desert, jungle, forest, airport, and many more! Be on the frontline of the battleground or take to the air to shoot enemies from the helicopter!

Beware! Combat will be challenging, and enemies will become stronger over time, so upgrading your guns won't be enough. Level up teammates and prepare your military crew for shooting waves of soldiers!

Do you have what it takes to free your country from invaders and win the war?
70070000022206.intro:
Soldier! War is coming, and duty calls you! 
Enemies are invading our country, and we need YOU to defend it!
70070000022206.name: Infantry Attack: Airstrike Edition

70070000028839.description:
Treat your patients with different dental issues, from cavities to plaque buildup, and watch as their smiles transform under your expert care!

Perform treatments under time pressure, and don't forget about your customer's comfort. If you drill too long in the teeth, the customer will be dissatisfied with your service!

Features:
- perform a lot of different dental procedures on your new mad scientist's chair 
- decorate customers' teeth with new sparkling diamonds or apply a varnish that will change their color
- work under time pressure and do your job the best you can! 
- unlock and apply 12 tooth skins, 10 bling skins, and 10 chair skins
- upgrade the look of your clinic to make it cozier 
- buy an upgrades so your customers can last longer during dental treatment

Pull out decaying teeth and replace them with shiny new ones. Change their shape to fangs or apply braces. Yes doctor, at your salon, your patients LOVE braces!

Don't forget about your special BLING diamond treatment. This is a fancy teeth salon after all! 

Whatever you do, BLING, make them smile!
70070000028839.intro:
Ready for the ultimate dental experience?
Dive into the world of tooth care and become a master dentist!
70070000028839.name: Dentist Bling: Science Edition

70070000028850.description:
A beautiful hidden object game awaits you with Snug Finder: More Fun and Snug Finder: Hidden Joy DLCs — guaranteed to bring you hours of fun!

Snug Finder is a charming hidden object game. Step into the role of a keen-eyed finder and search for all the hidden items — but be warned, it’s not always as easy as it seems!

Immerse yourself in a delightful experience filled with hand-drawn illustrations, soothing sounds, and a cozy atmosphere. Enjoy hours of gameplay across 75 beautifully crafted levels with over 500 hidden objects. Let the adventure begin!

Features:
-Over 500 hidden objects to discover
-75 beautifully illustrated levels
-Stunning hand-drawn visuals
-Relaxing, cozy atmosphere
-Full touchscreen support
70070000028850.intro: Hey there, Finder! You’ve just uncovered something truly special — a charming hidden object adventure with delightful DLCs is waiting for you!
70070000028850.name: Snug Finder: Deluxe Edition

70070000028871.description:
Choose your favourite skin, eat, grow and stay alive. 
Compete in multiplayer mode with up to 4 players or eat it all by yourself.

Features:
- 7 maps with different things to swallow 
- 21 animated skins to make your black hole look cooler
- 2 multiplayer modes up to 4 players on one screen!
- endless mode where you swallow things falling from the sky
- powerups spawning  during the game
- collecting themed stickers
- easy controls so anyone can play
- simple rules and lots of fun!

Grow by swallowing everything in front of you, whether it be garbage cans, fire hydrants or cars. Get large enough to consume even bigger objects or other players. Eat until nothing and no one is standing in your way!
70070000028871.intro: Show who is the biggest black hole in the universe!
70070000028871.name: Hole io: Doomsday Edition

70070000028873.description:
You're about to dive into a sugary adventure! Combine sweets, and prepare yourself for a sugar overload!

NEW VERSUS MODE!
Race to merge the biggest candy while using clever tactics to slow down your opponent. Unleash tricky power-ups, and prove who’s the ultimate candy master!

Gather extraordinary powers that can save you from any sticky situation. Mix them up, and you might create something even more powerful!

Journey through worlds full of surprises. Each has its own set of challenges. Can you master them all and merge the largest sweet?

Features:
- Online leaderboards to show off your skills!
- Co-op mode for you and your friend!
- Versus mode to sabotage your friends!
- 2 standard maps and a new Under Water map!
- New animal characters and swimming accessories
- Fully customizable name and character
- Awesome, game-changing power-ups!
- An adorably sweet aesthetic

Sweeten your day with a new high score!
70070000028873.intro: Don't let the sweets get outside the dome. Merge them together, and make the biggest candy!
70070000028873.name: Candivity: Pirate Edition

70010000093765.description:
No one remembers what the world looked like before, except for a team of brave rangers. Now chaos and unpredictability reign everywhere - harmless creatures in the past bring destruction, and the world around is constantly changing, over and over again nullifying the familiar environment around.

COMBINATION OF CLASSIC GAMEPLAY AND MODERN MECHANICS
Take control of one of the brave rangers and go on a responsible mission - find the villains, stop the widespread madness and return peace and justice to the world!
You will meet many unique opponents that will keep you busy: run, jump and shoot to save the world! Each ranger has their own fighting style and special skills, so you can choose the hero that best suits you!

BEAUTIFUL PIXEL GRAPHICS
The universe of Rusty Rangers is full of detailed worlds, original and colorful characters, useful items and bizarre creatures. Each pixel is made with great love. Enjoy the beautiful and incredible world of Rusty Rangers!

STORY QUESTS AND CHARACTERS
Follow the story of Rusty Rangers and find out what really happened and how to fix it. With each new passage you will learn more about this world and its inhabitants. Chat with characters, complete their tasks, and get help in the fight against the cruel baron!
70010000093765.intro: Rusty Rangers is an action platformer and roguelike with elements of metroidvania. Choose your ranger and explore procedurally generated dungeons!
70010000093765.name: Rusty Rangers

70010000099611.description:
Welcome to Sleepy Meadow, a relaxing exploration game set in a peaceful valley where time seems to slow down. Nestled between gently rolling hills, lush forests, a sparkling lake, and a cascading waterfall, this cozy meadow is your sanctuary.

Wander at your own pace through the vibrant landscape, discovering hidden paths, tranquil spots, and charming surprises tucked away in nature. Your only goal is to explore everything the cozy meadow has hidden within.

There are no enemies, no time limits, and no pressure—just a beautiful world waiting for you to explore.

Features:
A serene open world to explore at your own pace
Peaceful soundtrack and ambient sounds of nature
Ideal for all ages and fans of cozy, non-violent games
No Rush, Just Peace: There’s no stress.
70010000099611.intro: Wander, unwind, and let the meadow carry you away.
70010000099611.name: Sleepy Meadow

70070000028866.description:
No backup. No second chances. Just you—and the mission.
Step into the line of fire across four explosive games where only skill, strategy, and sheer determination will see you through. The bundle delivers hard-hitting gameplay in four distinct worlds, each demanding a different kind of hero.

- Cop Officers: Police Simulator of NYPD City
Crime doesn’t sleep, and neither do you. Hit the streets of a crime-ridden city as a relentless NYPD officer. Pursue suspects, conduct raids, and enforce the law by any means necessary. Patrol with purpose, and show criminals that order still has a name.
- Critical Strike: SWAT Rescue Missions
Hostages are held. The clock is ticking. As the leader of an elite SWAT unit, you're the last line between chaos and control. Breach doors, clear rooms, and make every bullet count in tense, tactical operations where one wrong move spells disaster.
- Hunter Simulator Wild Hunting
No safety nets. No second shots. Stalk deadly predators through unforgiving wilderness where you’re not just the hunter—you’re also the hunted. Use stealth, precision, and instinct to survive in an open world ruled by nature’s fiercest beasts.
- Warfront Tactics: Battlefield Chronicles Battle Simulator
Total war. Zero mercy. Command massive battles in a physics-driven strategy experience where every unit matters, and every mistake is punished. Outthink, outflank, and outfight your enemies as you carve your name into the history of war.

One bundle. Four battlegrounds. No compromises.
If you're looking for action, danger, and high-stakes decisions at every turn, this is the bundle you’ve been waiting for. Suit up, load out, and prove you have what it takes to dominate in every arena.
70070000028866.intro: Are you ready to answer the call from every front?
70070000028866.name: POLICE SIMULATOR & CRITICAL STRIKE & HUNTER SIMULATOR & WARFRONT TACTIS (SHOOTER & SIMULATOR BUNDLE)

70010000098247.description:
Welcome to Cozy Cove, a peaceful pirate island full of mystery, lush jungle trails, and forgotten hideaways. Step into the boots of a curious wanderer and set off on a serene yet intriguing journey across a sun-soaked cove brimming with history and hidden wonders.

This isn't your typical pirate adventure—there are no sword fights or sea battles. Instead, you'll explore at your own pace, soaking in the atmosphere, discovering landmarks, and piecing together the island’s secrets one step at a time.

Features:
Explore a Handcrafted Pirate Island
Relaxing, Non-Linear Gameplay
Environmental Storytelling
Immersive Atmosphere

 Ready to Set Foot on the Island?
70010000098247.intro: Uncover the Secrets of a Lost Pirate Paradise
70010000098247.name: Cozy Cove

70010000097044.description:
In the third chapter of the Bee Flowers series, you’ll guide bees through stunning environments while solving logic puzzles on a hexagonal grid. The goal is simple: connect paths to deliver pollen to the flowers. The gameplay is accessible, but the challenges increase as you progress.

With 30 carefully designed levels, the game features three distinct biomes:
Green Fields: A peaceful green field, perfect for learning the mechanics and getting used to the game’s rhythm.
Autumn Grove: An autumn scene with leaves covering the paths and winds affecting the bees' movement.
Winter Hollow: A cold, serene environment where puzzles require more planning and attention.

Bee Flowers: Save the Garden combines minimalist visuals, a relaxing soundtrack, and thoughtful mechanics to offer an engaging experience, perfect for puzzle lovers with a touch of personality.

Time to save the garden — one path at a time.
70010000097044.intro: The bees are back for another mission
70010000097044.name: Bee Flowers: Save the Garden

70010000099572.description:
Cozy Gardener Simulator is a heartwarming game where you become a caring gardener and the keeper of coziness in a small town. Grow vegetables and flowers in your very
own garden, take care of flower beds, tend to your plants, and beautify the streets. Keep lawns neat and tidy using your trusty lawnmower to trim overgrown grass.
Features:
-Grow and nurture your garden with seeds, water, and fertilizer.
-Care for the town by mowing lawns, tending flower beds, and cleaning up litter.
-Meet and help townsfolk with their small requests, building friendships along the way.
-Enjoy relaxing, slow-paced gameplay with no pressure or time limits.
-Collect tools, unlock seeds and decorations to expand your garden and keep the town charming.
Discover the stories of the townspeople, complete wholesome quests, and fill your days with simple joys. In Cozy Gardener Simulator, every small task brings warmth and beauty to the town—and to your heart.
70010000099572.intro: Plant, water, and grow – fun at every step.
70010000099572.name: Cozy Gardener Simulator

70010000080431.description:
Flower Shop: Summer In Fairbrook:

Struggling student Steve is shipped off by his dad to his uncle’s farm for the summer so he can learn responsibility.

Take control of Steve as he spends a summer in Fairbook, working on the farm, making new friends, and maintaining old relationships. You can raise and sell your own crops, spend time with local girls, and schedule activities for your week in advance.

The game features nine different endings that change based on your decisions throughout the game. Will Steve become a good, responsible farmer, find love, or both?


FEATURES
* Dating sim with farming sim gameplay
* Raise your crops and sell them at the market
* Plan how you spend your time with the weekly scheduler
* Relationship system: each character has a relationship value that affects gameplay
* Total of 9 different endings!


Flower Shop: Winter In Fairbrook:

Natalie has barely survived her first semester in college, and all she wants is a break. 

However, her parents insist that she start acting like a responsible adult and get a job during her school's winter break. In no time at all, Natalie's roommate sets her up with a job, and she's shipped off to the town of Fairbrook for a mundane job in a flower shop. What's a poor, tired student to do?

Take control of Natalie as she spends winter in Fairbrook raising flowers, making friends, and maybe even finding love!


Features:
* Same universe as Flower Shop: Summer In Fairbrook
* Visual novel interface
* Dating sim with farming sim gameplay
* Weekly scheduler
* Relationship system
* 9 different endings
70010000080431.intro: ~ Flower Shop: Summer In Fairbrook + Flower Shop: Winter In Fairbrook ~
70010000080431.name: Flower Shop: The Complete Story

70010000095620.description:
Meet the Ex-Calibre Knights, elite pilots in state-of-the-art exo-mechs, defending peace, justice and hope across the world! The Exo-Tech corporation is dedicated to developing advanced weapons and defenses to aid humanity, but when AI drones go haywire and start attacking the populous, it’s up to you to take control of the Ex-Calibre Knights and restore order by any means necessary!

Take flight as one of 3 pilots, each with unique shot types and melee weapons, and engage in vertical scrolling shoot’em up combat against swarms of automaton enemies. Take down screen-filling bosses and chase high scores, earning bonuses for maintaining high health and not losing lives along the way. Challenge player rankings in leaderboards for each of 4 unique play modes!

• Choose from a team of 3 unique pilots and unlock more characters as you progress!
• Blast through vertical scrolling bullet hell stages.
• Use various shot types and melee weapons to take down enemy swarms and big bosses!
• Enjoy 2D pixel art aesthetics and colorfully cute designs!
• Watch the lighthearted narrative unfold through cutscenes and comms dialogue.
• Climb the leaderboards for Story, Arcade, Boss Rush and Time Rush modes!
70010000095620.intro: Take to the skies as a team of cute pilots and fight for peace in vertical scrolling bullet hell style!
70010000095620.name: Exo-Calibre

70010000095746.description:
The unique co-op experience that made How 2 Escape a success is back with improved gameplay and new challenging puzzles!

The latest edition in the How 2 Escape series, How 2 Escape: Lost Submarine, has you and a partner work together to locate a missing submarine and prevent the start of a global war.


SAVE THE WORLD

An important allied military base has been captured by enemy forces, prompting the government to preemptively order the launch of a torpedo to reclaim it - despite the potential for countless allied deaths. 

However, after further internal discussions and negotiations with the enemy, the government has cancelled the strike that could spark a potential global war. The only problem is "The Triumphant", the submarine carrying the torpedo, is out of communication range and no one can confirm if the cancellation orders have reached the submarine. 

To prevent war, the government has tasked its two best experts, officers Haurée and Leroy, to locate “The Triumphant” before time runs out. These two strategic masterminds of the submarine fleet will face a reality they did not expect, as recent decisions have ignited a moral dilemma among the underwater sailors.


COOPERATE TO WIN

2 players, 2 ways to play!

Put your communication and puzzle-solving skills to the test as you and a partner work together to prevent the start of war! Each of you has a crucial role to play that requires logic, coordination, observation and, above all, communication!

As player one, your job is to locate and investigate the inside of the submarine, where you’ll explore and interact with the environment.

Your friend is tasked with using the dedicated free companion app* to gather additional information so you both can solve the puzzles together. 

*Get the free How 2 Escape: Lost Submarine Companion App on your smartphone.


Features: 

• Co-op puzzle solving with a friend
• Cross-platform plays on two devices
• Only one copy of the game is needed
• Increasingly challenging puzzles
• Simple controls
70010000095746.intro: How 2 Escape: Lost Submarine is an escape room-like puzzle game where two players need to cooperate on different devices to prevent the start of a global war.
70010000095746.name: How 2 Escape: Lost Submarine

70010000097224.description:
Step into the world of retail and take charge of your very own supermarket in Supermarket Simulator 2025! Start small and work your way up, managing inventory, setting prices, and keeping customers happy. Whether it's stocking shelves with everyday essentials or the latest must-have toys, your decisions shape the success of your store.

Customize your supermarket’s layout, hire and train staff, and ensure smooth day-to-day operations. Handle online orders, make deliveries by scooter, and trade rare items to boost profits. Keep an eye on security, deal with unexpected events, and create a shopping experience that keeps customers coming back.

Can you turn a humble store into a thriving retail empire? The doors are open, and the business is in your hands!
70010000097224.intro: Because every empire starts with a teddy bear.
70010000097224.name: Supermarket Simulator 2025

70010000098862.description:
Get ready to tackle clever puzzles, slippery blocks, and a very friendly minotaur! Minos Dungeon is a pixel art puzzle game that combines logic, strategy, and a good dose of creativity—perfect for those who love solving problems in a fun way.

You control Ferdinando, a good-natured minotaur who isn't interested in fighting in labyrinths—he just wants his treasures! To achieve this, you'll need to push stone blocks through mysterious rooms, cover treacherous holes, and solve increasingly complex challenges. But don't think it's just about pushing: the blocks slide until they hit something, and each level brings surprises that will test your reasoning.

Throughout three unique biomes, you'll discover increasingly wacky mechanics: breakable blocks, arrows that change the direction of blocks, teleporting traps, and even floors that make everything stop instantly. Each new world creatively mixes these elements, requiring strategy, logic, and a lot of patience.

Minos Dungeon is a journey full of retro charm, ingenious puzzles, and that feeling of victory that only comes when you fit the right block in the right place. Enter this labyrinth and prove you're smarter than the Minotaur himself.

Features:

SMART AND FUN CHALLENGES — Solve puzzles with creative mechanics and a difficulty curve that respects your time and challenges you to think outside the box.

THREE BIOMES, DOZENS OF LEVELS — Explore the scorching heat of Magma, the ancient mysteries of the Ruins, and the freezing challenges of Snow. Each with unique visuals and new mechanics to master.

FULL OF PERSONALITY — With pixelated visuals and a charismatic atmosphere, Minos Dungeon blends the classic with the modern in an experience tailor-made for puzzle lovers.

Ferdinando is ready. Are you?
70010000098862.intro: Help Ferdinando find treasures in a labyrinth full of puzzles!
70010000098862.name: Minos Dungeon

70010000076197.description:
Assemble yourself in a hostile spacecraft where almost everything that moves is trying to get you. The reason? Yours to discover! Explore, fight, and learn your purpose in this galactic action-adventure.

Oirbo is a 2D action-platformer adventure that takes place on a huge spacecraft divided into interconnected areas. Search in every section for the pieces that make out the history of the journey and enhance your skills and components to get to new heights.

Explore a massive spaceship to find answers, but beware of the army of robots that are coming for you; avoid them; fight them, or simply outsmart them in this futuristic hand-drawn adventure in space!

Features
- Beautiful hand-drawn art
- Classic platforming and combat system
- Choose your own path to explore a monolithic spacecraft
- Not a single line of human text to read!
- Discover new skills and put them to the test on challenging platforming puzzles
- Piece together a fragmented story from the past
- Dozens of enemies to fight and overcome
- 5 bosses to vanquish
70010000076197.intro: Explore a labyrinthine spacecraft and discover its mysteries and purpose.
70010000076197.name: Oirbo

70010000085885.description:
Brace yourself for the darkest chapter yet in the epic Poppy Playtime saga.

You are pushed deeper into the undiscovered depths of the Playtime Co. factory, far below anything the world knew. Here, you’ll encounter terrifying new threats and discover shocking revelations. Can you outwit the unnatural new creations lurking in the shadows? Can you survive here long enough to eventually unravel the mysteries behind the experiments? Every step will test your courage, every puzzle will challenge your mind, and every corner may be your last.

Features:
• New Characters (and Allies): New extraordinary characters guide your way, and haunt your nightmares.
• Expanded Lore: Discover more about the dark secrets of Playtime Co. and its twisted past.
• Mind-Bending Puzzles: Solve intricate puzzles that could mean the difference between life and death.
• Heart-Pounding Atmosphere: With haunting visuals and immersive sound design, the terror never lets up.

Will you escape the horrors hidden within Playtime Co., or will you succumb to the terror?
70010000085885.name: Poppy Playtime: Chapter 4

70010000087950.description:
Boxville 2 continues the adventure of cans living in a box city. Two friends were setting up fireworks for the city celebration, but a mistake caused chaos and one friend went missing.

Boxville 2, from Triomatica Games, is the next part of an adventure game about cans living in a box city.
Two can friends had an important job from the mayor to set up fireworks for the city's celebration. But due to a mistake, the fireworks went off wrong, causing chaos in the city. Worse, one of the friends went missing. Now, the main character, a red can, has to explore different areas and secret spots in Boxville and even travel outside the city to fix everything and find his friend.

What you can expect to see and hear in Boxville:
- Hand-drawn graphics — all backgrounds and characters are carefully drawn by our artists.
- Every animation and sound is created especially for each interaction.
- Unique music track was created for every scene to accomplish the atmosphere of the game.
- Tens of logical puzzles and mini-games are tightly incorporated into the story of the game.
- There are no words in the game — all characters communicate via cartoony sketches.
70010000087950.name: Boxville 2

70010000088929.description:
The Grand Opening:
Welcome to Once Upon a Puppet, a 2.5D puzzle-platformer that unfolds within a vibrant world of theater. Take part in a magical tale that combines classic platforming with puppet-inspired gameplay, in a captivating story of friendship, self-discovery, and redemption.

Wear the glove of Nieve, a Stagehand exiled to the Understage, and wield control over Drev’s strings, a Puppet magically bound to her. As they journey to return to the Frontstage above, they will retell forgotten stories, uncover shadowy secrets, and learn their fate is interwoven with the kingdom of theater itself.

Highlights:
Become Puppet and Puppeteer: Pull the strings and master the art of puppetry in this unique approach to action, movement, and creative puzzle-solving. 
A Troupe of Characters: Meet an ensemble cast of dozens of Major and supporting characters, featuring hundreds of lines of handcrafted dialogue. 
Deadly Shadows: Face a horde of villainous creatures who will do all they can to snuff out the lights and bring the show to an untimely end. 
A Meticulously Crafted World: Marvel at the stylized and detailed graphics that reinforce the magic of theater, with stages that fluctuate between past and present. 
Set The Scene: Arrange and move props, backdrops and characters to rebuild theatrical stages, and re-enact scenes to unveil what befell the once proud World Stage. 
Enchanting Soundscapes: Be captivated by a rich, theatrical soundtrack and immersive sound effects that bring the world of Once Upon a Puppet to life...


The Leading Actors:
Unwittingly bound together by spool and thread, Drev and Nieve reluctantly embark on a quest to reclaim their place in the theater, against a heartbroken King.

Nieve, a talented Weaver beset by self doubt, builds a strong bond with Drev, a naive yet ambitious Actor. With Drev's unbridled theatrics and Nieve's brilliance, they will conquer their deepest held fears to reveal the truth of the void harbored in their hearts.
70010000088929.intro: Control the strings of fate and embark on a grand adventure in the theatrical-inspired world of Drev & Nieve in Once Upon a Puppet.
70010000088929.name: Once Upon a Puppet

70010000095301.description:
Team up with your "other self", Honno-chan, as you parry, pummel and pulse your way out of your darkest nightmare in this one-of-a-kind "parry heaven" action game!

Use your nightmare's strength against it with your trusty parry move! Stun foes, send away projectiles, and stop threats right in their tracks by chaining parries!

Honno-chan will defeat any foes you stun automatically. Leave them to her and focus on the defense!

Parrying grants your soul more and more courage to face the night! Heal up by continuing to parry! Spend excess soul to unleash a powerful Burst move to wipe out hordes of enemies at once!

Collect powerups from rare foes to supercharge Honno-chan! Breathe fire, deploy orbital pain, wreak havoc, and more!

Defeated enemies drop light. Collect light and the darkness of the nightmare abates, giving you a clearer view of the chaos. Max out your light meter to beat the nightmare!

Will you be able to escape the nightmare and greet a new day...?
70010000095301.intro:
Easy to pick up, and hard to put down! 
Parry Nightmare is a one-of-a-kind "parry heaven" action game where the best offense is a good defense!
70010000095301.name: Parry Nightmare

70010000097747.description:
Zombies are everywhere! Arcade-inspired shooter, where relentless waves of undead creeps shamble, sprint, and swarm at you in a cramped room! Your only chance? A wild arsenal of weapons and just enough skill (and blind LUCK!) to keep the hordes at bay. 

Strap in and embrace the chaos! Trapped in an inescapable room, you’ll take on endless waves of zombies, mowing them down by the hundreds with randomly spawning weapons. Every five waves, a boss shows up to ruin your day. Survival demands quick reflexes, clever strategy, and just a pinch of madness!

Brace yourself for the a unique boss battle in every "Overloaded" stage! Each boss battle brings a unique  challenge—from hammer-swinging behemoths to undead S.W.A.T. team nightmares. The odds? Totally stacked against you. And just when you think you've got the upper hand, these bosses get tougher, meaner, and deadlier every time they come back!

Compete with the world and prove you’re the ultimate zombie slayer!
70010000097747.name: Zombies Overloaded

70010000098428.description:
Crayon Dino: Dinosaur Coloring
Crayon Dino is a newly released version that features only dinosaurs from the popular app 'Crayon Crayon'.

Selected as a recommended app on iOS, it delivers the same fun experience that made 'Crayon Crayon' hugely popular in Russia and the Middle East. Enjoy playing!

Introducing ""Crayon Dino,"" a creative coloring experience for everyone from children to adults! Breathe life into various dinosaur friends using the Nintendo Switch™ touchscreen and the intuitive controls of the Joy-Con™. From prehistoric jungles to volcanic zones, a variety of unique dinosaur templates await you, including Tyrannosaurus, Triceratops, Pteranodon, and more.

Special Features:

A natural coloring experience that feels like using real crayons
Realistic textures where colors blend and layer
Educational elements to learn fun facts about dinosaurs

Immerse yourself quietly in creation alone, or color together with family and friends to challenge for the gold medal.

Start a colorful journey back to prehistoric times and unleash your creativity with "Crayon Dino."
70010000098428.intro:
A creative coloring experience for everyone from children to adults.
Show off your completed masterpieces to your family.
70010000098428.name: CRAYON DINO

70010000098450.description:
The rules are as simple as possible - dig the hole. Dig deep. Deeper than you can even imagine.

Don't be afraid to get your hands dirty, because there's real treasure waiting for you in the ground. Start digging and miracles will happen. You have no idea what could be under your lawn.

Everything you find can be sold and used to upgrade your tools or buy new equipment to help you dig faster and find more.

8 SECRET MINES
Uncover hidden tunnels and exclusive areas throughout the game.

20 TYPES OF ORE
Discover a wide variety of ores, each offering unique value and potential for upgrades.

3 TYPES OF DIG TOOLS
Upgrade your tool from Shovel to Drill and up to a Vacuum Cleaner.

CONSUMABLES
Utilize Dynamite for explosive power and a Lamp for enhanced visibility in dark areas.

4 BIOMES
Explore diverse environments that impact your digging experience and resource availability.

69 UPGRADES
Enhance all your equipment with a nice and robust upgrade system, including special upgrades for rare minerals.

Check out the new fun game from the NOSTRA.GAMES team.

Can you reach the true depths?
70010000098450.intro: No time to explain. Just start digging!
70010000098450.name: Hole Digging Master

70010000098605.description:
"Do you like the red room?"

Solve the puzzle and uncover the urban legend. What is the truth behind the mysterious red room...?

Roa: "I haven't figured it out yet... How about you?!"

This is a fun, meditative puzzle game with a mysterious twist. Construct floor plans strategically to earn higher scores while unraveling the eerie secrets hidden within each layout. Each puzzle is randomized, offering a fresh challenge every time you play.

With multiple endings, a built-in tutorial, and quietly atmospheric gameplay, it’s perfect for players who enjoy mindful logic puzzles, exploration, and a hint of the uncanny.
70010000098605.intro: A floor plan was sent to the urban legend-researching VTuber, Roa Usagi. Hidden within it was a certain 'strange mystery.
70010000098605.name: Floor Plan Puzzle (Red Room Simulator)

70010000099382.description:
Collect pieces of the cute idols and complete the puzzle!
Clear stages to see high-quality images of the idols!
70010000099382.intro:
Many slightly dark and troubled, yet cute idols appear!
An easy puzzle game anyone can play!
70010000099382.name: Dark Dolls

70010000099474.description:
Train your eyes and brain by finding the one hidden difference in each photo pair.
It’s a simple and fun way to sharpen your focus and thinking.

How to play is easy：
・Take a close look at the photo at the top of the screen
・Compare it with the photo below and find what’s different
・When you spot the difference, move the cursor over it and hit “OK”!

The puzzles are a bit challenging,
but the easy controls make it perfect for a casual play session.
Great for killing time or giving your brain a quick workout.

Totally stuck?
Try pressing the hint button –
it’ll give you a clue about where the difference is hiding!
70010000099474.intro:
Challenge your eyes and brain
with a slightly tricky spot-the-difference game!
70010000099474.name: Mind & Sight Spot the Difference Workout

70010000099895.description:
No joke this time, I'll describe the game for what it is:
- 10 levels, 3 difficulties, playable in 2 players Coop!
- A Versus mode, against your enemy or friend, or against ???
- Unlock skins and musics as you play the game (that's why there's only one new music this time)
- 247
70010000099895.name: A Bibelot: Y-Break

70050000054563.description:
※This additional content is also available as part of the "Additional Card Unlock Pass." Please be aware that the content will only be applied once, so avoid duplicate purchases.

・Adds cards from 【DZ-BT05】 "Omniscient Awakening".

You can obtain additional cards by purchasing packs from 【DZ-BT05】 "Omniscient Awakening" in the in-game shop or by crafting them.

For card details, please check the latest updates on the official Cardfight!! Vanguard Dear Days 2 website
70050000054563.name: Cardfight!! Vanguard DD 2:Card Unlock Vol.2 【DZ-BT05】 "Omniscient Awakening"

70050000058259.description:
Featuring SIX new Rhythm Rifts for:
- "Too Real" by Danny Baranowky feat. Hatsune Miku (free song!)
- "Intergalactic Bound" by Yunosuke & CircusP feat. Hatsune Miku
- "M@GICAL☆CURE! LOVE ♥ SHOT! by SAWTOWNE" feat. Hatsune Miku
- "Just 1dB Louder" by IOSYS TRAX feat. Hatsune Miku
- "MikuFiesta" by AlexTrip Sands feat. Hatsune Miku
- "Radiant Revival" by Jamie Paige feat. Hatsune Miku

Each Rhythm Rift comes with:
- A fully-bopping Hatsune Miku virtual idol
- Background visualizer with leek and music note particle FX
70050000058259.intro: Join the one and only Hatsune Miku in a musical adventure with her OFFICIAL Music Pack!
70050000058259.name: Hatsune Miku Music Pack

70050000058260.description:
This Rhythm Rift comes with:
- A fully-bopping Hatsune Miku virtual idol
- Background visualizer with leek and music note particle FX

(This track is part of the Hatsune Miku Music Pack.)
70050000058260.intro: Face your demons with the official Rhythm Rift for "Too Real" by Danny Baranowky feat. Hatsune Miku!
70050000058260.name: Rift of the NecroDancer: Hatsune Miku - "Too Real"

70050000058449.description: Extend your collection and design rooms with twenty new items.
70050000058449.intro: Create your dream room and make it truly yours
70050000058449.name: Cottagecore

70050000058450.description: Extend your collection and design rooms with twenty new items.
70050000058450.intro: Create your dream room and make it truly yours
70050000058450.name: Mediterranean

70070000028842.description:
Featuring SIX new Rhythm Rifts for:
- "Too Real" by Danny Baranowky feat. Hatsune Miku (free song!)
- "Intergalactic Bound" by Yunosuke & CircusP feat. Hatsune Miku
- "M@GICAL☆CURE! LOVE ♥ SHOT! by SAWTOWNE" feat. Hatsune Miku
- "Just 1dB Louder" by IOSYS TRAX feat. Hatsune Miku
- "MikuFiesta" by AlexTrip Sands feat. Hatsune Miku
- "Radiant Revival" by Jamie Paige feat. Hatsune Miku

Each Rhythm Rift comes with:
- A fully-bopping Hatsune Miku virtual idol
- Background visualizer with leek and music note particle FX
70070000028842.intro: Join the one and only Hatsune Miku in a musical adventure with her OFFICIAL Music Pack!
70070000028842.name: Rift of the NecroDancer: Hatsune Miku Music Pack

70010000059174.description:
Step into the role of Kazuki and Ryogo as tensions rise across volatile military zones. With the fate of the region hanging in the balance, command towering Wanzers and lead your squad through intense, turn-based battles.


STORY

FRONT MISSION 3: Remake is a tactical RPG set in a future where nations and corporations compete for dominance in a world shaped by powerful mechs called Wanzers. The game follows two diverging storylines based on an early choice made by the protagonist, Kazuki Takemura. Both narratives focus on a global conspiracy involving secret weapons, corporate greed, and nationalistic agendas.

The game begins with Kazuki and his best friend Ryogo unwittingly becoming embroiled in a military conflict after a routine delivery to a military base.
